comment: Smart Data Models - GovSteamCC adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.EnergyCIM/master/GovSteamCC/schema.json
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Cross compound turbine governor model.

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity.

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: description
contents.comment: A description of this item

contents.name: dhp
contents.comment: HP damping factor (Dhp).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: dlp
contents.comment: LP damping factor (Dlp).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: fhp
contents.comment: Fraction of HP power ahead of reheater (Fhp).  Typical Value = 0.3. Default: 0.0

contents.name: flp
contents.comment: Fraction of LP power ahead of reheater (Flp).  Typical Value = 0.7. Default: 0.0

contents.name: mwbase
contents.comment: Base for power values (MWbase) (>0).  Unit = MW. Default: 0.0

contents.name: name
contents.comment: The name of this item.

contents.name: pmaxhp
contents.comment: Maximum HP value position (Pmaxhp).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: pmaxlp
contents.comment: Maximum LP value position (Pmaxlp).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: rhp
contents.comment: HP governor droop (Rhp).  Typical Value = 0.05. Default: 0.0

contents.name: rlp
contents.comment: LP governor droop (Rlp).  Typical Value = 0.05. Default: 0.0

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object.

contents.name: t1hp
contents.comment: HP governor time constant (T1hp).  Typical Value = 0.1. Default: 0

contents.name: t1lp
contents.comment: LP governor time constant (T1lp).  Typical Value = 0.1. Default: 0

contents.name: t3hp
contents.comment: HP turbine time constant (T3hp).  Typical Value = 0.1. Default: 0

contents.name: t3lp
contents.comment: LP turbine time constant (T3lp).  Typical Value = 0.1. Default: 0

contents.name: t4hp
contents.comment: HP turbine time constant (T4hp).  Typical Value = 0.1. Default: 0

contents.name: t4lp
contents.comment: LP turbine time constant (T4lp).  Typical Value = 0.1. Default: 0

contents.name: t5hp
contents.comment: HP reheater time constant (T5hp).  Typical Value = 10. Default: 0

contents.name: t5lp
contents.comment: LP reheater time constant (T5lp).  Typical Value = 10. Default: 0

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: address
contents.comment: The mailing address
